Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at H10 Las Palmeras in Arona (Playa de las Americas), you'll be convenient to Veronicas Strip and Los Cristianos Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Arona Pyramid and Troya Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 519 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Veronicas Strip - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Arona Pyramid - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Troya Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Torviscas Beach - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Siam Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Golf Las Americas - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Puerto Colon - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Bobo Beach - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Del Duque Beach - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Camel Park - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi

The preferred airport for H10 Las Palmeras is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
